notes:
The arrows fly at a speed of 1200, and always fly the full distance
 The arrows' speed are not affected by projectile speed increasing effects

The cast range and arrows' travel distance can be increased by attack range bonuses, but not by cast range bonuses
 Checks for Clinkz' current attack range upon each arrow release

Releases the arrows in 0.33 ([picture:talent_tree_symbol] 0.22)-second intervals, starting immediately upon channel begin This means it takes total of 1.67 ([picture:talent_tree_symbol] 1.78) seconds to release all arrows

The arrows are released from the tip of the bow, not from Clinkz' center point
 This results in the first launched arrow being offset slightly towards Clinkz's left side as compared to the following arrows

Causes Clinkz to perform instant attacks on enemies hit by the arrows These instant attacks can proc any attack modifiers and on-hit effects normally They have True Strike, and completely ignore disarms The instant attacks deal no damage, Burning Barrage's damage comes from the ability itself, but still counts as attack damage [picture:searing_arrows] Searing Arrows applied are based on its current level, but only when Clinkz is still channeling as the instant attacks occur This means if the channeling gets interrupted, the arrows stop applying Searing Arrows on targets they hit The Searing Arrows applied by Burning Barrage do not cost any mana and are applied even if the ability itself is currently not castable The instant attack of Burning Barrage does not break [picture:smoke_of_deceit] Disguise TALENT NOTES The multishot [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent is not applied to Burning Barrage

Reduces Clinkz' total outgoing damage by 50%/45%/40%/35% ([picture:talent_tree_symbol] 25%/20%/15%/10%) as the instant attacks occur This means any damage dealt in the same time frame gets reduced as well (e.g [picture:searing_arrows] Searing Arrows and [picture:maelstrom] Chain Lightning)
The arrows provide 300 radius flying vision around them as they travel, this vision does not last
Does not affect [picture:animal_courier_radiant_minimap] Couriers
abilities.description: Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
abilities.name: Burning Barrage
abilities.story: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

notes: The cast range of Searing Arrows is based on the attack range of the caster Therefore, the bonus attack range [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent further increases the cast range to 725

The bonus damage is dealt in a separate damage instance, and counts as spell damage
 This means it is not affected or considered by anything that works with attack damage
 This also means that it fully works with spell damage amplification and spell lifesteal
Can be cast on buildings but not on wards and allied units
TALENT NOTES The damage increasing [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent immediately upgrades all of Clinkz's currently flying Searing Arrows

With the multishot [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent, whenever Searing Arrows is used, a different random target within its cast range is also targeted by a second Searing Arrow Causes Clinkz to perform an instant attack on the chosen target whenever he launches a Searing Arrow These instant attacks can proc any attack modifiers and on-hit effects normally They do not have True Strike Since it uses the ability's cast range, effects that increase its cast range increase the secondary arrows' range as well The secondary arrow has no target priorities It simply chooses a random valid target within cast range Since Searing Arrows affect buildings, the secondary arrows can target buildings but not Outposts
abilities.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.story: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.

notes: Does not interrupt Clinkz' channeling abilities upon cast
During the fade time, Clinkz can cast abilities, use items and perform attacks without breaking the invisibility
Invisibility is broken upon launching an attack, landing a successful attack, or upon reaching the cast point of items and abilities
Grants phased movement while fully invisible, and allows Clinkz to path through other units, including wards, but not through buildings
Clinkz can pick up or drop items without breaking the invisibility Casting [picture:burning_army] Burning Army and [picture:death_pact] Death Pact also does not break the invisibility

SHARD NOTES Spawns 2 [picture:unknown_unit] Skeleton Archers 250 range away from Clinkz to his right and left side, facing the same direction The archers only spawn upon losing the Skeleton Walk buff, no matter how The archers are the same as the ones summoned by [picture:burning_army] Burning Army and its notes fully apply SPELL STEAL [picture:unknown_unit] Skeleton Archers spawned does not apply [picture:searing_arrows] Searing Arrows
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.
abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.story: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.

notes: Requires [picture:aghanim's_scepter] Aghanim's Scepter to be unlocked
Can be cast without having to face the targeted area

Spawns the archers in the given line one after another, starting immediately upon cast
 It takes 2 seconds for all archers to spawn

The first archer spawns at the initial targeted location
 Following archers spawn with 312.5 in between each
 The archers spawn facing the same direction as Clinkz does as they spawn

The archers cannot be controlled
 They automatically attack nearby enemy heroes, regardless of auto-attack settings
 The archers only attack heroes, including illusions and clones, excluding creep-heroes
 The archers only switch their attack targets when their current target cannot be attacked anymore

The archers' base and bonus attack damage is periodically set equal to 30% of Clinkz' main and bonus attack damage respectively
 Their attack damage is not reduced by damage block sources
The attack range of the archers is also periodically set equal to the caster's attack range For Clinkz', his Skeleton Archers have a minimum 600 ([picture:talent_tree_symbol] 725) attack range

Skeleton Archers have [picture:searing_arrows] Searing Arrows, based on its current level The level for the ability is set for each archer as it spawns Leveling it afterward does not update its level on the archers Although having a mana pool, the archers do not need mana to cast it TALENT NOTES Both damage increasing and Searing Arrows multishot [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talents fully affect Skeleton Archers
Heroes and creeps deal 750 and 150 damage per hit respectively to Skeleton Archers

The archers do not block neutral creep camps SPELL STEAL The [picture:unknown_unit] Skeleton Archers' attack properties are based on [picture:rubick_minimap] Rubick's, while their [picture:searing_arrows] Searing Arrows's ability values are based upon acquiring
abilities.description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
abilities.name: Burning Army
abilities.story: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

notes: Requires the [picture:death_pact] Death Pact creep abilities gaining [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent learned to be unlocked Can only acquire abilities of neutral creeps Other units' abilities cannot be gained Abilities are gained instantly upon devouring the creep This ability is hidden when there is no acquired ability

Only acquires the ability in the creep's first ability slot, so the following abilities cannot be acquired [picture:toughness_aura_%28wildwing_ripper%29] Toughness Aura, [picture:packleader's_aura_%28alpha_wolf%29] Packleader's Aura, [picture:death_throe_power_%28hellbear_smasher%29] Death Throe: Power, [picture:death_throe_rush_%28hellbear%29] Death Throe: Rush, [picture:unholy_aura_%28satyr_tormenter%29] Unholy Aura, [picture:shard_split_%28mud_golem%29] Shard Split, [picture:mana_aura_%28satyr_mindstealer%29] Mana Aura, and [picture:heal_amplification_aura_%28hill_troll_priest%29] Heal Amplification Aura Does not acquire any of the attack class abilities or [picture:inspiration_aura_%28flagbearer_creep%29] Inspiration Aura
The acquired ability is bound to the Death Pact buff, meaning losing it, or devouring a creep with no abilities removes the acquired ability as well

The abilities use the original cast point of the neutral creeps they come from
 However, the cast backswing differs depending on the ability acquired (see chart)
EXPR Cast point: Original Cast Point of Acquired Ability Cast backswing: 0.77 - OriginalCastPoint, 0 when OriginalCastPoint ≥ 0.77
abilities.description: This ability is hidden when there is no acquired ability from Death Pact.
abilities.name: Devoured Ability 1

notes: Can be cast without breaking the invisibility of [picture:skeleton_walk] Skeleton Walk
The targeted unit is instantly killed, counting as a regular last hit or deny

Despite the description, the bonus health and flat bonus attack damage are based on the target's max health, not current health
 Increases Clinkz' max health without keeping the current health percentage, then heals him for the same amount
When the Death Pact buff expires, Clinkz' max health returns to normal, but his current health is kept, without exceeding his max health

Successive casts of Death Pact do not stack, but refresh the duration and update the values TALENT NOTES The max health increasing [picture:talent_tree_symbol] talent does not update an already existing buff
Cannot be cast on ancient creeps and creep-heroes
abilities.description: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
params: Target Max Health as Health Bonus: 30%/55%/80% ([picture:talent_tree_symbol] 50%/75%/100%)
Target Max Health as Attack Damage Bonus: 4%/8%/12%
abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.story: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.

description: Stalks invisibly to ambush lone enemies. As Clinkz loosed his final arrow, the demon Maraxiform ignited the land with hellfire, burning him to the bone. Yet, the heroic bowman did not die. He had slain the demon, and unwittingly earned king-mage Sutherex's reward — Eternal life. Immortalized at the precipice of death, Clinkz now makes advantageous use of his skeletal body. Camouflaged, he walks into hostile lands, forming Death Pacts with wildlife to learn their ways and empower his shots and vitality. The demon's inferno burns within his ribs, with which he now rains Fiery Death upon his foes, Searing His Arrows to devastating effect. When backup is needed, Clinkz calls upon a Burning Army of skeletal compatriots, incinerating his foe in flames of their hellfire barrage.  Carry Escape Pusher ★★☆
trivia: Bone Fletcher's alternate/fun name was "Clinkz Eastwood", a pun on the name of famed actor Clint Eastwood.
The line Link▶️ "Better to run than curse the road." is a reference to a Wolof (Senegal) proverb, "Better to walk than curse the road".
The clinkz's bow has been made by his grandfather's bones.

The phrase Link▶️ "Thy Flesh Consumed." may be referred to the fourth and final episode of Ultimate Doom game, and also to King James version of the Bible "And thou mourne at the last, when thy flesh and thy body are consumed" PROVERBS 5:11.

Clinkz's phrase Link▶️ "Ashes to ashes." is a reference to a common christian saying, popularized by the Book of Common Prayer "[...]we therefore commit his body to the ground; earth to earth, ashes to ashes, dust to dust;[...]".
history: At the base of the Bleeding Hills stretches a thousand-league wood, a place called The Hoven, where black pools gather the tarry blood of the uplands, and the king-mage Sutherex sits in benevolent rule. Once a sworn protector of the Hoven lands, Clinkz earned a reputation for his skill with a bow. In the three-hundredth year of the king-mage, the demon Maraxiform rose from sixth hell to lay claim to the forest. In response, the king-mage decreed an unbreakable spell: to any who slew the demon would be granted Life Without End. Unaware of the spell, Clinkz waded into battle, defending his lands against the demon's fiery onslaught. Clinkz drove Maraxiform back to the gates of sixth-hell itself, where on that fiery threshold the two locked in a mortal conflict. Grievously wounded, the demon let out a blast of hellfire as Clinkz loosed his final arrow. The arrow struck the demon true as hellfire poured out across the land, lighting the black pools and burning Clinkz alive at the instant of the demon's death. Thus, the mage's spell took effect at the very moment of the archer's conflagration, preserving him in this unholy state, leaving him a being of bones and rage, caught in the very act of dying, carrying hell's breath with him on his journey into eternity.

notes: The attack range talent also affects the cast range of Searing Arrows, and the range of Burning Barrage.
